name: Expandingo
description:
Somewhere in Australia, a group of Koalas are up to no good (they are pirating movies). You, a dingo, must put a stop to this. Stretch yourself to full length and rotate like a fan to knock them out, and retract to a shorter length to dodge the movie covers they throw at you!

Controls:

WASD to move, RMB to spin counterclockwise, LMB to spin clockwise,  Mouse Wheel to expand/retract, delete to go to the citations page /exit the game at any time.

Created  by Daniel Fuerlinger and Ben Glaser

special thanks to  Adri for the intro music:   https://adridoesthings.bandcamp.com/
